name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Sacred and the Haunted: Anime Nun in Graveyard  Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in mystery with Anime Nun in a graveyard live wallpaper, featuring dynamic visuals, shortcuts, and a sleek design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: A serene yet eerie anime nun amidst a haunting graveyard.
Minimalist Design: Clean interface for a smooth and captivating browsing experience.

Quick Access Shortcuts: Fast links to popular websites.
